info.title: EBMS
info.description: Connect you EBMS data with hundreds of other services in the world!  A subscription to the EBMS API Gateway is required.

post.description: Create a new product in EBMS.

TREE_ID.description: Select the product category where the product is to be created.
TREE_ID.title: Product Category

DESCR_3.description: Description 3, this is a multi-line descripton
DESCR_3.title: Description 3

MFG.description: MFG ID, must match EBMS manufacturers ID exactly
MFG.title: Mfg ID

PRI_VENDOR.description: Primary Vendor ID, must match EBMS exactly
PRI_VENDOR.title: Primary Vendor ID

EXTERNALID.description: Unique ID of the program integrated with EBMS
EXTERNALID.title: External ID

post.summary: When a task is created or changed

DESCR.description: The webhook description that will be displayed in EBMS
DESCR.title: Description

CRUD.title: Trigger when
CRUD.description: A = Created updated or deleted, X = Created or updated,  Y = Created or deleted, Z = Updated or deleted, C = Created, U = Updated, D = Deleted

PA03.description: Enter the task type - case sensitive
PA03.title: Task type

PA05.description: Any word or phrase that is in the task description
PA05.title: Description Filter

PA01.description: The task status, e.g. Open, Closed,  Completed
PA01.title: Status

PA02.description: Enter the primary worker ID, e.g. DOEJOH
PA02.title: Worker ID

PA04.description: The task priority, e.g. Low, Normal, High, Emergency
PA04.title: Priority

PA06.description: Any word or phrase that is in the task phase
PA06.title: Phase

PA00.description: Compile a codebase expression here that will define the condition upon which this will trigger in EBMS and send the notification to this flow
PA00.title: Expression

post.description: When a task in EBMS is created, changed or deleted this trigger will receive a notification and basic data.

PA01.title: Category ID

PA04.title: Type filter

PA00.title: Expression

PA01.title: Customer ID filter

PA02.description: Any string of letters or numbers that is in the Sales Order Description field
PA02.title: Description filter

PA03.title: Sales Order Status
PA03.description: U = Created updated or deleted, X = Created or updated,  Y = Created or deleted, Z = Updated or deleted, C = Created, U = Updated, D = Deleted

PA04.title: Mfg ID
